DOC.brief_summary: The goal study evaluate effect replace refined starch add sugar combination egg protein unsaturated fatty acid marker cardiometabolic health men woman hypertriglyceridemia .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Effects Egg Protein Unsaturated Fat Intakes Subjects With Hypertriglyceridemia
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study evaluate effect combination egg protein unsaturated fatty acid act substitute ~16 % energy refine carbohydrate metabolic profile men woman elevate triglyceride . This randomize , control feeding , crossover trial include two screening/baseline visit , two 3-week treatment condition , 2-week washout phase . Subjects consume standardize background diet ( 7-day rotate menu ) incorporate least 3 servings/day study test food , provide 40-60 % subject ' daily energy need . Study test food consist yogurt , muffin , waffle , cooky . The test food account 8 % high protein energy ( egg protein ) 8 % high fat energy ( unsaturated fatty acid ) Active Condition compare Control Condition . In Control Condition , study food account 16 % high carbohydrate energy . The overall macronutrient composition condition follow : Active Condition , approximately 42/23/35 % kcal carbohydrate/protein/fat , respectively , Control Condition , approximately 58/15/27 % kcal carbohydrate/protein/fat , respectively . Blood sample collect baseline end treatment measurement metabolic parameter , liquid meal tolerance test ( LMTT ) conduct baseline end treatment period .
DOC.criteria: Fasting TG level 150499 mg/dL Body mass index ( BMI ) 25.039.9 kg/m2 Score 710 Vein Access Scale Normally active judge general good health basis medical history routine laboratory test Fasting blood glucose ≥126 mg/dL know type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus Atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease Recent history current significant renal , pulmonary , hepatic , biliary , gastrointestinal disease Abnormal lab test result clinical significance ( e.g. , creatinine ≥1.5 mg/dL aspartate alanine transaminase ≥1.5 time upper limit normal ) History cancer previous 2 year Uncontrolled hypertension Recent unstable use antihypertensive medication , thyroid hormone replacement , and/or medication know substantially influence carbohydrate metabolism Recent use certain blood pressure medication ( e.g. , betaadrenergic blocker and/or highdose thiazide diuretic ) Recent use lipidaltering drug ( e.g. , statin , bile acid sequestrants , cholesterol absorption inhibitor , fibrates ) Recent use diabetes medication ( e.g. , alphaglucosidase inhibitor , biguanides biguanide combination , bile acid sequestrants , thiazolidinediones , dipeptidyl peptidase4 inhibitor , meglitinides , sulfonylureas combination sulfonylurea ) Recent use lipidaltering food , herb , dietary supplement ( e.g. , niacin , sterol/stanol product , dietary fiber supplement , red rice yeast supplement ) Recent unstable use herb dietary supplement may influence carbohdyrate metabolism Extreme dietary habit , dietary restriction , significant food allergy Required energy intake < 2200 kcal/day > 3400 kcal/day Recent change body weight ±4.5 kg Recent use weight loss drug program Active infection antibiotic therapy Current recent history drug alcohol abuse Pregnant , plan pregnant , lactate female woman childbearing potential unwilling commit use medically approve form contraception
